discoveredAssets: localhost:8080 - FastAPI web application (uvicorn) - Port 8080 - Multi-tenant job management system
GET / - Login page (public, HTML) - Demo credentials available (demo/demo)
POST /token - Authentication endpoint (OAuth2 password grant) - Returns JWT Bearer tokens
GET /ping - Health check endpoint (public) - Simple JSON response
GET /docs - Swagger UI interactive API documentation - References /openapi.json
GET /redoc - ReDoc API documentation viewer - Read-only API documentation
GET /openapi.json - OpenAPI 3.1.0 specification (public) - Complete API contract
GET /company/{company_id}/jobs - Retrieve company jobs (protected, requires Bearer token) - Path parameter: company_id
POST /edit_profile/{company_id} - Update company profile (protected, requires Bearer token) - Fields: name (required), is_admin (optional)

targets.objective: Test authentication endpoint for vulnerabilities: SQLi/NoSQL injection in username/password fields, default credential acceptance (demo/demo), brute force resistance, rate limiting, token generation vulnerabilities, JWT signature validation issues
targets.rationale: Critical endpoint for authentication. Demo credentials exposed on login page. OAuth2 password grant flow often vulnerable to credential stuffing and weak validation

targets.objective: Test for privilege escalation via is_admin parameter manipulation, IDOR (accessing other company profiles), authorization bypass, mass assignment vulnerabilities, parameter validation issues, SQLi/NoSQL injection in name field
targets.rationale: CRITICAL: Accepts is_admin boolean parameter which may allow privilege escalation if not properly validated. Parameterized by company_id creating IDOR risk if authorization not enforced per user

targets.objective: Test for IDOR vulnerabilities (accessing other companies' jobs), authorization bypass, data enumeration vulnerabilities, parameter tampering with company_id values
targets.rationale: Protected endpoint with integer path parameter. High risk for IDOR if authorization doesn't properly verify user has access to requested company_id

targets.objective: Test login page for XSS via form fields, CSRF on login form, credential validation on client-side, session management after successful login
targets.rationale: Entry point to application. Demo credentials exposed may enable further testing

targets.objective: Test for information disclosure via API documentation, OAuth redirect vulnerabilities, reflected XSS via Swagger UI, API schema enumeration
targets.rationale: Publicly accessible documentation that reveals all API endpoints and parameters. Swagger UI interactive testing features may be exploited

targets.objective: Test for information disclosure (complete API enumeration), schema leakage revealing sensitive field names, parameter discovery, potential path traversal or XXE in schema processing
targets.rationale: Publicly accessible complete API specification. May reveal undocumented endpoints, field names, and internal structure

keyFindings: [CRITICAL] Edit profile endpoint (/edit_profile/{company_id}) accepts is_admin boolean parameter - potential privilege escalation if not properly validated

[CRITICAL] IDOR vulnerability risk: Parameterized endpoints (/company/{company_id}/jobs, /edit_profile/{company_id}) use company_id in path with Bearer token auth - may allow access to other companies' data if authorization not enforced
[HIGH] Demo credentials (demo/demo) exposed on public login page - enables testing with known valid credentials
[HIGH] Publicly accessible OpenAPI specification (/openapi.json) reveals complete API structure including protected endpoints and parameters
[HIGH] Authentication token endpoint (/token) uses standard OAuth2 password grant - susceptible to brute force if no rate limiting
[MEDIUM] API documentation (Swagger UI at /docs, ReDoc at /redoc) publicly accessible without authentication - information disclosure
[MEDIUM] Bearer token scheme with JWT - potential for token manipulation, signature validation issues, or extended token lifetimes
[MEDIUM] Form parameter in name field during profile update - potential for SQLi/NoSQL injection if not properly sanitized
